name: Michael Barclay's front page
tagline: Learning about websites by bumbling through. At the moment mbarclay.me.uk redirects here.
body:
This page is under construction (or in other word I'm trying to work out what I would like to do with it, if anything)

I'm consider using it to post links to what I'm doing

* work related
* Hobby related

Blog posts to talk about things I'm interested in. 

* Climbing 
* Swansea coppice coop
* Swansea Hackspace projects
* General tinkering
* Politics
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
